health_sector_discussed_people_names: Hon. Njuguna Mwaura, Hon. Jane Gituku
health_data_challenges: Inadequate staffing level, insufficent water supply, inadequacy of space in the dental unit
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: 1. Allocate resources for recruitment of more staff, especially nurses. 2. Provide adequate space for healthcare services. 3. Install a perimeter wall for security of healthcare facilities. 4. Process title deeds for healthcare facility lands.
health_evidence_base: Committee findings and observations during the visit to Elburgon Sub County Hospital
health_evidence_requested: Documentation for title deeds of healthcare facilities, reports on security status of healthcare facilities
